mapper.sql: r.room_id, r.room_number, r.room_type, r.room_floor, r.room_building, r.room_status
on_id, on_oldid, on_time, on_addname, on_addtime, on_bed, on_registrant, on_rtime, on_operator, on_note
onx.on_id, onx.on_oldid, onx.on_time, onx.on_addname, onx.on_addtime, onx.on_bed, onx.on_registrant, onx.on_rtime, onx.on_operator, onx.on_note, onx.on_OpTime
mapper.update: update jd_on set on_time = #{onTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, on_registrant = #{onRegistrant,jdbcType=INTEGER}, on_rtime = #{onRtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, on_operator = #{onOperator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, on_note = #{onNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where on_id = #{onId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update jd_on set timeliness = 1 where on_id = #{onId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select , , , , , ,
from jd_on onx inner join jd_oldpeople o on onx.on_oldid = o.oldpeople_id inner join service_nurse sn on onx.on_registrant = sn.id inner join sys_user su on onx.on_addname = su.id inner join service_nurse sn2 on onx.on_operator = sn2.id inner join a_bed b on onx.on_bed = b.bed_id inner join a_room r on b.bed_room = r.room_id where onx.timeliness = 0 order by onx.on_id desc

on_oldid = #{onOldid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
on_time = #{onTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

on_operator = #{onOperator,jdbcType=INTEGER},
on_note = #{onNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where on_id = #{onId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update jd_on set on_oldid = #{onOldid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, on_time = #{onTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, on_addname = #{onAddname,jdbcType=INTEGER}, on_addtime = #{onAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, on_bed = #{onBed,jdbcType=INTEGER}, on_registrant = #{onRegistrant,jdbcType=INTEGER}, on_rtime = #{onRtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, on_operator = #{onOperator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, on_note = #{onNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where on_id = #{onId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
